title.rendered: STEDI LED FOG WITH DRL UPGRADE FOR ARB DELUXE BULLBAR

content.rendered:
You asked for it, so we made it. The ultimate upgrade to suits the ARB Deluxe Bull bars. This is an easy drop in solution to your existing ARB fog light housing and will transform the little yellow puddles of lights to a high performance 5700K LED, with built in Day Time Running Light function. Our optics retain a very sharp lateral beam making these an excellent upgrade to penetrate below fog. Fog has a tendency to slightly hover above the tarmac and the idea behind the sharp lateral cut line is that the beam pushes underneath the fog to provide usable illumination, with a very wide coverage.

FACTORY FIT LED FOG LIGHT

WITH DRL FUNCTION

LED & DRL UPGRADE

Stock is boring, which is why we created a beautifully engineered & designed LED Fog Light upgrade with integrated Day-Time Running Light (DRL). Design by STEDI  to specifically suit the ARB Deluxe bull bars. This is the one you we’ve waiting for.

ENGINEERED FOR PUNISHMENT

We know you’re tired of removing your bash-plate to service burnt out halogen bulbs or replacing broken fog lamps. Replacing bulbs is a thing of the past thanks to Solid State LEDs which we guarantee for 30,000 hours. No more broken lenses thanks to the automotive grade poly-carbonate lens. Designed to fit the existing ARB fog light shroud using all the stock mounting points.

HIGH PERFORMANCE LED

The above night shot characterizes the performance increase over stock perfectly. Powered by 5700K high performance LED’s bounce off of a hooded reflector to form a very flat and ultra-wide light beam. The difference in brightness is extraordinary.

DETAILS

KEY TECHNICAL DETAILS 

  • UV Stable automotive grade Poly-carb primary Lens | Unlike the OE ours lens wont break!
  • Environmentally sealed automotive connectors
  • Uses the same terminals as original ARB fog light for easy installation.
  • Military Spec Pressure Equalisation Vent | Eliminates condensation
  • IP67 Ingress Protection | Protected from immersion between 15 centimeters and 1 meter in depth for 10min at a time.
  • 50,000 hours Lifespan
  • 24 month Warranty
  • 5700K to ensure a CCT match to other STEDI LED products

Price quoted is for a pair (ARB Fog Light Shroud shown is not included)

Fits ARB Fog Light Kit Part No: 6821201. If you’re unsure whether your ARB bullbar is eligible feel free to get in touch with us for advice.

 Once installed we recommend that the beam is adjusted to ensure that it cuts off no higher than 50cm from the ground, with the car 25m away from a wall. 

Please note that this LED upgrade will not suit vehicle which have the IPF upgraded fog light housing and kit. If your fog light lens has the IPF logo embossed on it, this upgrade will not suit.

STEDI Designed & Manufactured. 

This product is not endorsed by, directly affiliated with ARB. All product and company names are the registered trademarks of their original owners. The use of any trade name or trademark is for compatibility and reference purposes only and does not imply any association with the trademark holder of their product brand.

SPECIFICATIONS

HOUSING MATERIAL DIE-CAST ALLOY
COMPATIBLE VOLTAGE 12v to 15v
LIFESPAN 30,000 hours
TESTED LUMENS (FOG) 764 Lm
TESTED LUMENS (DRL) 35 Lm
CONNECTOR TYPE Sealed
CERTIFICATION IP67
DRL DRAW  0.2A @13.6V
FOG LIGHT DRAW .8A @ 13.6v
DIAMETER 103mm

 

 

WHAT’S IN THE BOX

  • 2 x STEDI ARB Replacement LED Fog Lights
  • Connectors and Wire
  • 2 x Tilt Adjustments Spring and Screws

excerpt.rendered:
STEDI LED FOG WITH DRL UPGRADE FOR ARB DELUXE BULLBAR

Please note: If product is out of stock, wait times for this product can be between approx. 1 – 4 weeks from date of order.
